name: Rolling racers!
description:
Rolling Racers is a fun, fast paced, local multiplayer game for you and your friends to enjoy!  Race around as 4 unique animals! Be the fastest Capybara that pulled up. Bash into your friends to ruin their progress and become the ultimate champion of Rolling Racers! Full Game will include several fun power ups, new tracks for you and your friends and more! Ready? Get set. Get Racing!

Controls
(Xbox Controller)
LAS – Character Control
RAS – Camera Control
A – Confirm
B – Cancel
X – Force Start (on character select screen)

This is a collaborative, student made project that will be made over the course of 6 weeks at Staffordshire University.
